title: DDI instrument schema
description: JSON-schema representing an instrument in the DDI model. A physical entity produced by humans to perform specific tasks or functions

name.description: a property to specify the name of the instrument

type.description: a property to specify the type of the instrument/technology

isUsedBy.description: a property to specify the activity that makes use of this instrument

manufacturer.description: a property to specify the organisation which produced the instrument
